HomePage.title: Hello World
HomePage.heroSubtitle: Our exclusive collection of luxury perfumes, designed for you.

heroSlide2.title: Summer Collection
heroSlide2.subtitle: Refreshing and vibrant scents for sunny days.

form.title: Seller Application Form
form.description: Please fill in your store details below to get started.
form.successDescription: Your request to become a seller has been submitted. We will review it shortly.
form.AlertDescription: Your last request was not approved. Please review your information and submit again.

PremiumPage.title: Elevate Your Business, Become a Seller Today
PremiumPage.subtitle: Join our platform as a seller and start showcasing your products to thousands of customers. Fill out the form below to begin your journey with us.

reach.title: Wider Reach
reach.description: Showcase your products to a large and targeted audience interested in luxury perfumes.

sales.title: Increase Sales
sales.description: Utilize our marketing tools to boost your sales and grow your brand.

tools.title: Easy Tools
tools.description: A simple dashboard to manage products, track orders, and analyze your performance with ease.

loginPrompt.title: You're Just One Step Away
loginPrompt.description: Please sign in or create a new account to be able to submit a request to become a seller.

PENDING.title: Your Request is Under Review
PENDING.description: We have successfully received your application. Our team is currently reviewing it and you will be notified of the decision soon. Thank you for your patience!

APPROVED.title: Congratulations, Your Request is Approved!
APPROVED.description: You are now a verified seller on our platform. You can start adding your products and managing your store from your dashboard.

REJECTED.title: An Update On Your Application
REJECTED.description: After careful review, we regret to inform you that we cannot move forward with your application at this time. Please check your email for more details.

Metadata.categoryDescription: Browse the best products in the {categoryName} category.

CategoryPage.browsePrompt: Browse the latest products in the {categoryName} category
CategoryPage.noProducts: Sorry, there are no products in this category at the moment.

BrandPage.noProducts: No products found for this brand.
